00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
00023 
00024 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/algorithm/string.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/ptr_container/ptr_vector.hpp>
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00032 inline std::string lib_prefix() { return "[CLPP] "; }
00033 
00036 enum value_semantic {
00037     no_semantic         
00038     , path              
00039     , ipv4              
00040     , ipv6              
00041     , ip                
00042 };
00043 
00046 namespace detail {
00047 
00048 template< typename T >
00049 inline std::string to_str( const T& t ) {
00050     std::string as_string; 
00051     try {
00052         as_string = boost::lexical_cast< std::string >( t );
00053     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00054         std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Value cannot be present as std::string!";
00055         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00056     }
00057     return as_string;
00058 }
00059 
00060 template
00061 <
00062     typename STLContainer
00063     , typename Element
00064 >
00065 inline void delete_element( STLContainer& cont, const Element& element ) {
00066     cont.erase( std::remove( cont.begin(), cont.end(), element )
00067                 , cont.end() );
00068 }
00069 
00070 } // namespace detail
00071 } // namespace clpp
00072 
00073 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_MISC_HPP
